subject: AI & Agents
title: Feedback Loops: Users Improve the Model
description: A quick win: understand Feedback Loops: Users Improve the Model.

hook.text: Every thumbs-up and thumbs-down is a free label. Your users are annotating your data.

buildup.text: Implicit feedback (clicks, edits, dismissals) reveals what users actually want.

discovery.text: Collect feedback at the right moment: right after the AI output, not days later.

twist.text: Biased feedback: only unhappy users click 'bad.' You're seeing a skewed sample.

climax.text: Use feedback to fine-tune, retrain, and improve prompts in a continuous improvement loop.

punchline.text: Every interaction is a training signal.

quiz.question: Why is user feedback biased?
options: Unhappy users are more likely to leave feedback
